metadata.name: Malware: bad IP
metadata.value: Detection of malware based on a connection to a known bad IP address.

metadata.name: Active Scan: Log4j Vulnerable to RCE
metadata.value: Detects active Log4j vulnerabilities by identifying DNS queries for unobfuscated domains that were initiated by supported Log4j vulnerability scanners.

metadata.name: Data Destruction: Google Cloud Backup and DR expire image
metadata.value: A user requested the deletion of a backup image from Backup and DR. The deletion of a backup image does not prevent future backups.

metadata.name: Data Destruction: Google Cloud Backup and DR expire all images
metadata.value: A user requested the deletion of all backup images for a protected application from Backup and DR.

metadata.name: Data Destruction: Google Cloud Backup and DR remove appliance
metadata.value: A backup appliance was deleted from Backup and DR.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Deleted Google Cloud Backup and DR host
metadata.value: A host was deleted from Backup and DR. Applications that are associated with the deleted host might not be protected.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Google Cloud Backup and DR remove plan
metadata.value: A backup plan with multiple policies for an application was deleted from Backup and DR. The deletion of a backup plan can prevent future backups.

metadata.name: Impact: Google Cloud Backup and DR reduced backup expiration
metadata.value: The expiration date for a backup protected by Backup and DR has been reduced.

metadata.name: Impact: Google Cloud Backup and DR reduced backup frequency
metadata.value: The Backup and DR backup schedule has been modified to reduce backup frequency.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Deleted Google Cloud Backup and DR host
metadata.value: A host was deleted from Backup and DR.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Google Cloud Backup and DR delete policy
metadata.value: A Backup and DR policy, which defines how a backup is taken and where it is stored, was deleted.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Google Cloud Backup and DR delete profile
metadata.value: A Backup and DR profile, which defines which storage pools should be used to store backups, was deleted. Future backups that use the profile might fail.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Google Cloud Backup and DR delete storage pool
metadata.value: A storage pool, which associates a Cloud Storage bucket with Backup and DR, has been removed from Backup and DR.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Google Cloud Backup and DR delete template
metadata.value: A predefined backup template, which is used to set up backups for multiple applications, was deleted.

metadata.name: Inhibit System Recovery: Google Cloud Backup and DR remove plan
metadata.value: A backup plan with multiple policies for an application was deleted from Backup and DR.

metadata.name: Discovery: Can get sensitive Kubernetes object check
metadata.value: A potentially malicious actor attempted to determine what sensitive objects in GKE they can query for, by using the kubectl auth can-i get command.

metadata.name: Discovery: Service Account Self-Investigation
metadata.value: Detection of an IAM service account credential that is used t investigate the roles and permissions associated with that same service account.

metadata.name: Impact: Billing Disabled
metadata.value: Detects when billing has been disabled for a project.

metadata.name: Impact: Billing Disabled
metadata.value: Detects when billing has been disabled for multiple projects in an organization within a short time period.

metadata.name: Impact: Service API Disabled
metadata.value: Detects when a Google Cloud service API is disabled in a production environment.

metadata.name: Impact: VPC Firewall High Priority Block
metadata.value: Detects when a VPC firewall rule that blocks all traffic is added at priority 0.

metadata.name: Impact: VPC Firewall Mass Rule Deletion
metadata.value: Detects the mass deletion of VPC firewall rules by non-service accounts.

metadata.name: Command and Control: DNS Tunneling
metadata.value: Detects the handshake of the DNS tunneling tool Iodine.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Anonymous Sessions Granted Cluster Admin Access
metadata.value: Detects the creation of a role-based access control (RBAC) ClusterRoleBinding object adding the root-cluster-admin-binding behavior to anonymous users.

metadata.name: Exfiltration: BigQuery Data Exfiltration
metadata.value: 1) Resources owned by the protected organization that are saved outside of the organization, including copy or transfer operations. 2) Attempts to access BigQuery resources that are protected by VPC Service Controls.

metadata.name: Exfiltration: BigQuery Data Extraction
metadata.value: 1) A BigQuery resource owned by the protected organization is saved, through extraction operations, to a Cloud Storage bucket outside the organization. 2)A BigQuery resource owned by the protected organization is saved, through extraction operations, to a publicly accessible Cloud Storage bucket owned by that organization.

metadata.name: Exfiltration: BigQuery Data to Google Drive
metadata.value: A BigQuery resource owned by the protected organization is saved, through extraction operations, to a Google Drive folder.

metadata.name: Exfiltration: Move to Public BigQuery resource
metadata.value: A BigQuery resource is saved to a public resource owned by your organization.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Potential Kubernetes Pod Masquerading
metadata.value: Someone deployed a Pod with a naming convention similar to the default workloads that GKE creates for regular cluster operation.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: VPC Route Masquerade Attempt
metadata.value: Detects the manual creation of VPC routes masquerading as Google Cloud default routes, allowing egress traffic to external IP addresses.

metadata.name: Discovery: Unauthorized Service Account API Call
metadata.value: Detects when a service account makes an unauthorized cross-project API call.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Breakglass Workload Deployment Created
metadata.value: Detects the deployment of workloads that are deployed by using the break-glass flag to override Binary Authorization controls.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Breakglass Workload Deployment Updated
metadata.value: Detects when workloads are updated by using the break-glass flag to override Binary Authorization controls.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Breakglass Workload Deployment Created
metadata.value: Detects the deployment of workloads that are deployed by using the break-glass flag to override Binary Authorization controls.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Breakglass Workload Deployment Updated
metadata.value: Detects when workloads are updated by using the break-glass flag to override Binary Authorization controls.

metadata.name: Evasion: Access from Anonymizing Proxy
metadata.value: Detection of Google Cloud service modifications that originated from anonymous proxy IP addresses, like Tor IP addresses.

metadata.name: Execution: Kubernetes Pod Created with Potential Reverse Shell Arguments
metadata.value: Someone created a Pod that contains commands or arguments commonly associated with a reverse shell.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Manually Deleted Certificate Signing Request (CSR)
metadata.value: Someone manually deleted a certificate signing request (CSR).

metadata.name: Execution: Suspicious Exec or Attach to a System Pod
metadata.value: Someone used the exec or attach commands to get a shell or execute a command on a container running in the kube-system namespace.

metadata.name: Credential Access: Failed Attempt to Approve Kubernetes Certificate Signing Request (CSR)
metadata.value: Someone attempted to manually approve a certificate signing request (CSR) but the action failed.

metadata.name: Credential Access: Manually Approved Kubernetes Certificate Signing Request (CSR)
metadata.value: Someone manually approved a certificate signing request (CSR).

metadata.name: Credential Access: Secrets Accessed In Kubernetes Namespace
metadata.value: Detects when secrets or service account tokens are accessed by a service account in the current Kubernetes namespace.

metadata.name: Impair Defenses: Strong Authentication Disabled
metadata.value: 2-step verification was disabled for the organization.

metadata.name: Impair Defenses: Two Step Verification Disabled
metadata.value: A user disabled 2-step verification.

metadata.name: Impair Defenses: Strong Authentication Disabled
metadata.value: 2-step verification was disabled for the organization.

metadata.name: Impair Defenses: Two Step Verification Disabled
metadata.value: A user disabled 2-step verification.

metadata.name: Credential Access: External Member Added To Privileged Group
metadata.value: Detects events where an external member is added to a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions)

metadata.name: Credential Access: Privileged Group Opened To Public
metadata.value: Detects events where a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions) is changed to be accessible to the general public.

metadata.name: Credential Access: Sensitive Role Granted To Hybrid Group
metadata.value: Detects events where sensitive roles are granted to a Google Group with external members.

metadata.name: Credential Access: External Member Added To Privileged Group
metadata.value: Detects events where an external member is added to a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions)

metadata.name: Credential Access: Privileged Group Opened To Public
metadata.value: Detects events where a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions) is changed to be accessible to the general public.

metadata.name: Credential Access: Sensitive Role Granted To Hybrid Group
metadata.value: Detects events where sensitive roles are granted to a Google Group with external members.

metadata.name: Credential Access: External Member Added To Privileged Group
metadata.value: Detects events where an external member is added to a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions)

metadata.name: Credential Access: Privileged Group Opened To Public
metadata.value: Detects events where a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions) is changed to be accessible to the general public.

metadata.name: Credential Access: Sensitive Role Granted To Hybrid Group
metadata.value: Detects events where sensitive roles are granted to a Google Group with external members.

metadata.name: Credential Access: External Member Added To Privileged Group
metadata.value: Detects events where an external member is added to a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions)

metadata.name: Credential Access: Privileged Group Opened To Public
metadata.value: Detects events where a privileged Google Group (a group granted sensitive roles or permissions) is changed to be accessible to the general public.

metadata.name: Credential Access: Sensitive Role Granted To Hybrid Group
metadata.value: Detects events where sensitive roles are granted to a Google Group with external members.

metadata.name: Brute force SSH
metadata.value: Detection of successful brute force of SSH on a host.

metadata.name: Brute force SSH
metadata.value: Detection of successful brute force of SSH on a host.

metadata.name: Brute force SSH
metadata.value: Detection of successful brute force of SSH on a host.

metadata.name: Brute force SSH
metadata.value: Detection of successful brute force of SSH on a host.

metadata.name: Impact: Managed Instance Group Autoscaling Set To Maximum
metadata.value: Detects when a managed instance group is configured for maximum autoscaling.

metadata.name: Impact: Suspicious Kubernetes Container Names - Coin Mining
metadata.value: Someone deployed a Pod with a naming convention similar to common cryptocurrency coin miners.

metadata.name: Discovery: Information Gathering Tool Used
metadata.value: Detects the use of ScoutSuite, a cloud security auditing tool that is known to be used by threat actors.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Modify VPC Service Control
metadata.value: Detects a change to an existing VPC Service Controls perimeter that would lead to a reduction in the protection offered by that perimeter.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Modify VPC Service Control
metadata.value: Detects a change to an existing VPC Service Controls perimeter that would lead to a reduction in the protection offered by that perimeter.

metadata.name: Defense Evasion: Modify VPC Service Control
metadata.value: Detects a change to an existing VPC Service Controls perimeter that would lead to a reduction in the protection offered by that perimeter.
